doctor.name: Prof. Dr. S.M.G. Kibria
doctor.degree: FRCS (England), FRCS (Glasgow), FRCS (Edinburgh), FRCS (General), MSc (Leeds), MBBS (DMC)
doctor.specialty: Piles, Fistula, Fissure, Breast Cancer, Bowel Surgery, Stomach Surgery SpecialistGallbladder, Laparoscopic Hernia Repair, Laparoscopic Appendectomy, Diagnostic Laparoscopy, Laparoscopic Adhesiolysis
doctor.info: Professor Dr S.M.G. Kibria is a fully trained British Consultant General, Laparoscopic and Vascular Surgeon. He has 38 years of experience in General, Vascular and laparoscopic Surgery in the UK and obtained his complete British training in London, Leeds, Hull, Bristol, Gloucester and Bath. He has been a Consultant General, Vascular and laparoscopic Surgeon in the UK for the last 12 years after completing 20 years of training. S.M.G. Kibria is an examiner of the Royal College of Surgeons in the UK and has been a teacher at the University of Cambridge School of Medicine. He is currently a Senior Consultant at Lake View Clinic, Gulshan-2. He is also at Universal Medical College Hospital Ltd. Mohakhali, Dhaka. 6:00 PM-9:00PM (Closed: Friday)

doctor.name: Prof. Col. Dr. Md. Nasir Uddin (Mahmud)
doctor.degree: MBBS, FCPS (Surgery), FACS (USA), FMAS (India)Gold Medalist in FCPS (Surgery)
doctor.info: Prof. Col. Dr. Md. Nasir Uddin (Mahmud) is a highly accomplished General, Colorectal, and Laparoscopic Surgeon in Dhaka, holding MBBS, FCPS in Surgery, FACS from the USA, and FMAS from India, and is a Gold Medalist in FCPS (Surgery). He has completed Post Fellowship Training in Surgical Oncology from NICRH and Advanced Training in Breast Surgery from BSOS. Currently serving as a Professor of Surgery & Surgical Oncology at Combined Military Hospital (CMH), Dhaka, Dr. Nasir Uddin specializes in the surgical management of breast cancer, benign breast lumps, colorectal cancer, piles, fistula, hernia, gallstones, appendicitis, thyroid disorders, and laparoscopic procedures for various abdominal diseases. He provides consultations at Labaid Specialized Hospital, Dhanmondi, located at Room 283, House # 06, Road # 04, Dhanmondi, Dhaka – 1205, with visiting hours from 6 pm to 10 pm, except on Fridays.

doctor.info: অধ্যাপক সালমা ইয়াসমীন চৌধুরী ১৯৬৩ সালের জানুয়ারি মাসে রাজশাহী জেলায় জন্মগ্রহণ করেন । তিনি ১৯৮৬ সালে রাজশাহী মেডিকেল কলেজ থেকে এম.বি.বি.এস ডিগ্রী অর্জন করেন । এরপর তিনি চিকিৎসা বিজ্ঞানে উচ্চতর এম.এস এবং এফ,সি.পি.এস. ডিগ্রি এবং পরবর্তী-তে ইংল্যান্ড থেকে এফ.আর.সি.এস ডিগ্রী লাভ করেন। তিনি স্যার সলিমুল্লাহ মেডিকেল কলেজ এর সার্জারি বিভাগের আধ্যাপক হিসেবে কর্মরত ছিলেন। বর্তমানে তিনি তার নির্ধারিত চেম্বারে জেনারেল সার্জারি সম্পর্কিত সকল রোগী দেখে থাকেন এবং সাধারণ সার্জারির সকল ধরনের অপারেশান করে থাকেন।

doctor.info: Dr. Mohammad Sohel-Uzzaman is a skilled general and endo-laparoscopic surgeon in Dhaka with qualifications including MBBS (SBMC), BCS (Health), FCPS (Surgery), F-MAS, and a Fellowship in GI Endoscopy from Delhi. He specializes in treating conditions such as gallbladder stones, appendicitis, hernia, piles, fistula, gastrointestinal disorders, and performing various laparoscopic and minimally invasive surgeries. Dr. Sohel-Uzzaman is currently serving as an Assistant Registrar at Dhaka Medical College & Hospital. He sees patients at Khidmah Hospital, Dhaka (C-287/2-3 Khilgaon Bishwa Road, Khilgaon, Dhaka) from 4pm to 7pm, except on Fridays.

chamber.address: C-287/2-3 Khilgaon Bishwa Road, Khilgaon, Dhaka

doctor.name: Prof. Dr. Tapash Kumar Maitra
doctor.workplace: Birdem General Hospital & Ibrahim Medical College
doctor.info: Prof. Dr. Tapash Kumar Maitra is a highly experienced general and laparoscopic surgery specialist in Dhaka, holding MBBS and FCPS (Surgery) qualifications. He is currently serving as Professor and Head of the Department of Surgery at Birdem General Hospital & Ibrahim Medical College. Dr. Maitra provides expert surgical care for conditions like gallstones, appendicitis, hernia, piles, anal fissure, fistula, thyroid disorders, breast lumps, and various abdominal surgeries. He sees patients at BIRDEM Specialized Chamber Complex, Shahbag from 2pm to 4pm (closed on Friday).

chamber.address: Main Building, 122, Kazi Nazrul Islam Avenue, Shahbag, Dhaka

doctor.name: Prof. Dr. Samiron
doctor.workplace: Birdem General Hospital & Ibrahim Medical College
doctor.info: Prof. Dr. Samiron is a renowned general and advanced laparoscopic surgeon in Dhaka, specializing in the surgical management of gallstones, hernia, appendicitis, piles, thyroid diseases, and various abdominal disorders. He holds an MBBS and FCPS in Surgery, along with a Fellowship in Advanced Laparoscopic Surgery from India, and currently serves as a Professor of Surgery at Birdem General Hospital & Ibrahim Medical College. Dr. Samiron provides expert consultations and surgical care at BIRDEM Specialized Chamber Complex, located at Main Building, 122, Kazi Nazrul Islam Avenue, Shahbag, Dhaka, with visiting hours from 5pm to 7pm (closed on Friday).

chamber.address: Main Building, 122, Kazi Nazrul Islam Avenue, Shahbag, Dhaka

doctor.name: Dr. Bakhtiar Ahmed
doctor.workplace: Birdem General Hospital & Ibrahim Medical College
doctor.info: Dr. Bakhtiar Ahmed is an experienced General and Laparoscopic Specialist Surgeon in Dhaka, holding an MBBS, MPH, and FCPS in Surgery. He serves as a Resident Surgeon in the Department of Surgery at Birdem General Hospital & Ibrahim Medical College. Dr. Bakhtiar Ahmed specializes in treating gallbladder stones, appendicitis, hernia, piles, thyroid disorders, abdominal pain, gastrointestinal diseases, and performing laparoscopic surgeries. He provides consultations at BIRDEM Specialized Chamber Complex, Main Building, 122, Kazi Nazrul Islam Avenue, Shahbag, Dhaka, with visiting hours from 2pm to 7pm (closed on Friday).
